org.dmfs.android.calendarcontent.provider

Class CalendarContentContract.SubscribedCalendars

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dmfs.android.calendarcontent.provider.CalendarContentContract.SubscribedCalendars
  • Enclosing class:
    CalendarContentContract

    public static class CalendarContentContract.SubscribedCalendars
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents all subscribed calendars. To subscribe to a calendar, first ensure the product is either purchased, in free trial or unlocked by some other means, then use addCalendar(Context, long, String, int) to add it.

    You can unsubscribe a calendar at any time by calling delCalendar(Context, Uri).

    When a free trial expires, all calendars with that product id will be removed automatically.

    • Method Detail

      • getCalendarsForContentItemId

        public static final Cursor getCalendarsForContentItemId(Context context,
                                  long contentItemId)
        Returns a cursor for the calendar that belong to a specific content item id.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context.
        contentItemId - the id of the content item.
        Returns:
        a Cursor with 0 or 1 result.

      • getCalendarUrl

        public static final java.lang.String getCalendarUrl(Context context,
                              Uri contentUri)
        Returns the calendar URL for a specific subscription content uri.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context.
        contentUri - a Uri that points to a subscription.
        Returns:
        a String containing the calendar url or null if no such subscription exists.

      • addCalendar

        public static final Uri addCalendar(Context context,
              long contentItemId,
              java.lang.String calendarName,
              int calendarColor)
        Subscribe to a calendar and add it to the system calendar database. If there already is a disabled calendar it will be just enabled.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context
        contentItemId - The item id of the calendar to sync. Must be a calendar item, not a page item.
        calendarName - The name of the calendar.
        calendarColor - The color of the calendar.
        Returns:
        The Uri of the newly added subscription or null if there was an error.

      • updateCalendar

        public static final boolean updateCalendar(Context context,
                     Uri contentUri,
                     ContentValues values)
        Update the values of a calendar.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context
        contentUri - The Uri of the calendar subscription.
        values - The new values.
        Returns:
        true in case of a successful operation, false otherwise.

      • disableCalendar

        public static final boolean disableCalendar(Context context,
                      Uri contentUri)
        Unsubscribe to a specific calendar, keeping it around it from the database. If you re-enable it later you can keep the same name and color.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context.
        contentUri - The Uri of the calendar to disable.
        Returns:
        true in case of a successful operation, false otherwise.

      • delCalendar

        public static final boolean delCalendar(Context context,
                  Uri contentUri)
        Unsubscribe to a specific calendar, effectively removing it from the database. That will remove the entire entry including name and color.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context.
        contentUri - The Uri of the calendar to remove.
        Returns:
        true in case of a successful operation, false otherwise.
